app.name: Pado
app.tagline: A time to embrace the waves as they are

learning.title: Understanding Anxiety
learning.subtitle: Waves only stay for a moment. Learn how to wait for the wave of anxiety to pass.

acc_01.text: The waves may rise high, but they will soon settle down.
acc_01.subText: It’s okay if you don't force the anxiety to stay calm.

acc_02.text: The crashing waves are only a part of you, not all of you.
acc_02.subText: Anxiety is just something that passes through you for a moment.

acc_03.text: No matter how rough the waves are, your core remains steady.
acc_03.subText: Take a breath and focus on the sensations of the present.

val_01.text: Look beyond the waves to where you truly want to go.
val_01.subText: What is the most important thing to you at this very moment?

val_02.text: Wherever the waves pull, simply holding your own direction is enough.
val_02.subText: It's not about how high the waves are, but the direction you choose.

act_01.text: A single small move you make now creates a big difference.
act_01.subText: What is the smallest thing you can do right now, even if you feel anxious?

act_02.text: The small steps you take will eventually lead you to your destination.
act_02.subText: There is true strength in the direction your will creates.

act_03.text: Believe in the small steps you took today, rather than grand changes.
act_03.subText: Small actions gather to complete your precious daily life.

rest_01.text: It’s okay to stop and rest for a while. Stillness is a precious moment, too.
rest_01.subText: Pause all activities for a moment and just be there for yourself.

rest_02.text: Instead of trying to beat the waves, let them flow by and catch your breath.
rest_02.subText: Even without great effort, you are doing more than enough.
